title: Sensitive information disclosure [HtUS]
content:
Summary:
Hi Team :)
I found that the server status directory on your system is open, it displays server status and sensitive information by server
Steps To Reproduce:
[add details for how we can reproduce the issue]
visit: https://█████████/server-status/
Supporting Material/References:
███
[attachment / reference]
Impact
sensitive information is clearly displayed, that is, server status, attackers can find sensitive information from the server (server logs)
steps: Observe the displayed server status and sensitive information
vuln_description: The server status directory is openly accessible, displaying server status and sensitive information such as server logs, which could be exploited by attackers to gather sensitive data.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward access to a publicly available directory without any complex interactions or state manipulations. The discovery only requires visiting a specific URL, making it easy to identify.
